channel.title: PortForward Dilemma
channel.description: So I've always hosted an RSPS in the past, and never had problems with portforwarding ever. I have an Ubee router and I know I port forwarded correctly but on canyouseeme.org it says connection refused. I was thinking my ISP might be blocking the port but I'm not really sure how to resolve this. Please let me know what you think. - cam

item.title: PortForward Dilemma
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Problem solved. Thanks bud.

Read full topic
